commit message:
Added empty PoiListFragment

THis fragment will contain the CardView list of every POI found.
Also renamed some layout files.

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>

Optimized map layout

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>

Implemented CardView for POI

I added a RecyclerView for the POI List, which will contain every POI found with the WikiJourney API.
Every POI will be presented in a CardView, with a picture, the Wikipedia title and the summary (or first lines) of the article.

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>

Rework of Readme

Added Features, Planned features, Download links, Links to website/facebook/twitter, and license

New update of layouts

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>

POI list now shows cards about the POIs around

If you first go to the map, let it find your location and the POIs around, and then go to the POIs list, it shows cards based on the POIs!

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>

Bump to v0.0.3

Also did minor edits

Signed-off-by: Thomas Gaudin <thomas.gaudin@centraliens-lille.org>
